name: Neophron
description: The Neophron is a medium-sized fiend characterized by its chaotic evil nature and impressive mobility, boasting the ability to fly and high combat resilience.
memorable: Its ability to swallow foes and turn them into ghasts makes it a unique and dangerous opponent.
goals: Typically seeks to disrupt the order and instill chaos.
relations: Often associated with other fiends or chaotic creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark, chaotic realms or battlefields.
strengths: Immunities to poison and resistance to various damage types enhance its survivability in combat.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence score of 8 may limit strategic options.
attacks: Utilizes a Multiattack with a Bite that can swallow enemies and Claw attacks that can inflict poison.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to polymorph into a Large giant vulture, allowing for stealth or tactical retreats.
senses: Possesses Keen Sight and Smell, granting it advantage on Perception checks that rely on these senses.
skills: Proficient in survival with a +6 bonus.
additional_information: Has a Magic Resistance for enhanced defense against spells.
Can only swallow one creature at a time.
Creates ghasts from swallowed humanoids, gaining control over them.
Can regurgitate swallowed creatures under certain damage conditions.
High Constitution grants significant saving throw bonuses.
test_queries: poison immune creature that swallows foes
chaotic evil creature that creates ghasts
tactical monster with keen senses and magic resistance
